CustomField.formula: '<apex:page standardController="' + ffirule__IntegrationRule__r.ffirule__SourceObject__c + '" extensions="ffirule.IntegrationRuleEngine" docType="html-5.0" standardStylesheets="false" showheader="false" sidebar="false">'+ BR() + '<apex:variable var="sourceId" value="' + '{' + '!' + ffirule__IntegrationRule__r.ffirule__SourceObject__c + '.Id}"/>' + BR() +'<ffirule:IntegrationRule engine="'+'{'+'!'+'engine'+'}'+'" actionName="' + ffirule__ActionName__c + '" sourceId="'+'{'+'!'+'sourceId'+'}'+'"/>'+ BR() + '</apex:page>'
CustomField.label: VisualForce
